txt.en: 'Ahem. Due to a number of late arrivals, the show will be delayed five minutes.'
'Oh-ho-ho-ho'
'The G.L.O.B.E. is deeply sorry for any inconveniences this may cause.'
'Though we would like to remind you that all ticket sales are final.'
<rgb=#33FF00>Frodo</rgb><rgb=#FFE500> tells you, 'Come stand next to me'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Run stage-right!</rgb>
'To this day, no hobbit has seen or heard from Mr. Baggins or the old wandering conjuror.'
'Though some claim on cool, clear nights, the sound of distant laughter and jingling coins can still be heard around the old Party Tree.'
'Oh Bilbo, our party is going splendidly!'
'I'm not sure anything could spoil such a wonderful day.'
'We would like to remind you to use this time to visit our concession stand.'
'Why look, it's our cousins, the Proudfoots. Why don't you say hullo, Uncle?'
'Mayor Winston Goodnough would like to remind you that the throwing of rotten fruit is strictly prohibited.'
'Bilbo and I would like to thank all of you for attending.'
'The G.L.O.B.E. would like to remind you that all ticket sales are final.'
'We cannot express our gratitude for how happy we are being with you tonight.'
'I agree...Bilbo is a queer character, but well-spoken.'
'Before we conclude the evening, my uncle has something he would like to say.'
'What do you think happened this time?'
'My goodness! Perhaps you misheard my question....'
'And now, I believe, Bilbo has an announcement!'
'Perhaps someone took break a leg too seriously.'
'Are you even paying attention?'
'For all our sakes I hope so!'
'The party was very successful.'
'Food, drink, and music were all in plenty.'
'Though some were getting suspicious of some of the more nefarious guests.'
Throw Frostbluff Rotten Fruit at [placeholder]!
'And so the party continued.'
'All throughout the day, there was feasting and merriment.'
'The next show will begin in three minutes!'
'While the hobbits were preparing dinner, others were preparing something completely different....'
'A tent was erected over the party tree to hold dinner for Bilbo and his guests.'
'After the feast Bilbo and Frodo arose...it was time for the party-speech.'
'All in attendance waited with great anticipation to see what Bilbo would say.'
<rgb=#FF0000>This event requires a minimum of three active players</rgb>
'And so our tale comes to an end.'
The part of Gandalf will be played by [placeholder].
'Now we have Bag End all to ourselves, isn't that right, Gandalf?'
'Very well put, Uncle.'
'Oh, Uncle...always joking around....'
'Er, what my uncle meant to say was....'
'Another delay!'
'You think we'd be used to it by now....'
'What, the disappointment?'
'No, the terrible acting!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Select the Audience and perform an Emote</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>It's your turn to perform!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Select the Audience</rgb>
'Yes, yes!  Muahahahaaaa.'
'...Oh yes, of course, what plan? You old Villain you, for a second I almost thought....'
'Er, yes...we'll...trick him into....'
<rgb=#33FF00>Partygoer</rgb><rgb=#FFE500> tells you, 'Come stand next to me'</rgb>
The part of Bilbo Baggins will be played by [placeholder].
'The Curious Disappearance of Mad Baggins.'
'Not so very long ago, in the sleepy town of Hobbiton....'
'The notable Mr. Bilbo Baggins was preparing his birthday celebration.'
'The whole of the Shire began to feel the excitement.'
'Hobbits marked their calendars and eagerly anticipated the fateful day.'
'But not all of the guests had the same good intentions.'
'And so the day of the party finally arrived.'
'Hobbits lined up all down the Hill, even as far as the Three-Farthing Stone.'
'And Bilbo stood at his gate with his nephew to greet them each in turn.'
\qChoice 1\q
\qChoice 2\q
\qChoice 3\q
'Good evening, ladies and gentle-hobbits!'
'The Frostbluff Theatre, in association with the G.L.O.B.E. Acting Company...'
'...proudly present an evening of fine dining and entertainment.'
'Yes, yes! Let us begin the search for Mad Baggins' treasure!'
'I am your host, Bill Shakesburrow, and we have quite the show for you tonight!'
'Ah, a cunning plan! We'll make them think we're NOT looking for the treasure....'
'Due to...unforeseen circumstances, our scheduled performance of An Ode to Old Bloodtusk will not take place tonight.
'Yes, well, I agree...I think?'
'Instead, we have invited three members of our audience to take to the stage!'
'The next show will begin in two minutes!'
'They will accompany the G.L.O.B.E. in a special performance of the Curious Disappearance of Mad Baggins!'
'Let's hear a big round of applause for our actors for this evening!'
'While we ready our new actors backstage please take this time to visit our concession stand.'
'I am so excited for Mr. Bilbo's party.'
<rgb=#33FF00>Evil Dwarf</rgb><rgb=#FFE500> tells you, 'Come stand next to me'</rgb>
'I've heard he will spare no expense; every guest will receive a sack of gold and jewels from his hidden fortune!'
'Why, the postman has just delivered your invitation!'
'I must say, I've never had so much fun in all my life!'
'But who invited the sour-looking dwarf?'
'Oh well...how are you enjoying the party?'
'I am rather enjoying Bilbo's speech...are you not?'
'The next show will begin in one minute!'
'Very well put, Uncle.  We are quite happy to have you...enjoy the party!'
'Er...what I believe my uncle meant to say was, Won't you please enjoy the party?'
'...What my uncle meant to say was...what was it that you were saying?... Ah! Enjoy the party won't you?'
'Oh yes, I quite agree.'
'Er, Uncle...don't you mean....'
'Ha-ha...Uncle can be so funny sometimes...can't you, Uncle?'
'Four minutes until act one!'
'You're very right. I should stop worrying and enjoy the party!'
'Good, good, we must hurry, we haven't much time....'
<rgb=#00ffff>Throw Frostbluff Flower Petals at [placeholder]!</rgb>
'The show will begin shortly!  But first, a short introduction by our director.'
'I've heard the Protagonist is a real icy personality.'
'Oh...you think there might be something to worry about? Perhaps you're right....'
'Ah...always a sly one, Gandalf. I see what you're getting at...yes....'
'Oh really? That's surprising.'
'So you think...er...what is it that you think?'
'Er, what I'm sure you meant to say was...we'll be ready, yes, we will....'
'Why's that?'
The part of the Partygoer will be played by [placeholder].
'Because her acting's always luke-warm!'
'I quite agree...it should be a marvelous time!'
'Oh...perhaps you misheard me.  I said, Aren't you excited to go?'
'That's not in the...you can be so silly sometimes!'
'Muahahaa...Gandalf! Our plans are in motion!'
'One minute until show-time!'
'The day of Mad Baggins' party is almost upon us.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Throw Frostbluff Rotten Fruit at [placeholder]!</rgb>
'What evil plan do you have up your sleeve, Gandalf?'
'Everything is going according to plan, Gandalf.'
'No one suspects a thing, not even that pesky Frodo.'
'Are you ready to spring our trap and steal Mad Baggins' fortune?'
'Gandalf, NOW!'
'Muahaha, our plan is complete!'
'No one will suspect that we've...disposed of Mad Baggins.'
'Two minutes until show-time!'
'I hear they're having trouble back stage.'
'Oh, how so?'
'They've forgot their wolf costumes in the Shire.'
'What are they going to do?'
'I'm not sure, but I'm guessing it will be unBEARable to watch.'
